title: Can't remove authentication decisions "Send no client certificate"
content:
Hi,

I have many mTLS website and few Client Cert.

Under "View Certificate” >> "authentication decisions" many entries have "Send no client certificate" but with no website. I suspect that this is a display bug and messed with a decision I remove earlier. I try to delete these "empty" decision but they stay.

What is the underlying DB/data file firefox uses in the profile so I can check maybe directly there. Maybe "cert9.db" ? or ClientAuthRememberList.txt or ClientAuthRememberList.bin?

maybe similar to this? https://bugzilla.mozilla.org/show_bug.cgi?id=1718844

Thanks

title: BIASED SEARCH RESULTS
content:
Why do searches only show results from liberal news outlets? This is the case no matter which search engine I choose.

I can go many pages into search results and not see any results from conservative new sources such as Newsmax. And yet, if I put Newmax in the search I get their results. But why do I have to search that way. And more importantly, why do general searches ONLY SHOW LIBERAL NEWS results?

Here is an example from today's news that "Lester Holt stepping down" from NBC News.

A search of "Lester Holt stepping down" shows: NBC news, AP news, CNN, CBS, USA Today, NBC, Politico, New York Times, The Hollywood Reporter, People, Yahoo, and on. But NO conservative news outlets. And just to be clear, Fox News comes up sometimes (down several pages), but many things they report show me that they often don't show conservative viewpoints--which changed a couple years ago, with management changes.

I really want an answer to this question. The Liberal News BIAS is disgusting and needs to be stopped!

While I know that I can change the Search engine (currently set to DuckDuckGo), the problem is that they all generally show the same results. Just like they all rely on Google for their information.
creator: stuartm3

title: Can't restore bookmarks
content:
I am running Fedora 41 with firefox version 135.0.0-1.fc41

I have two linux accounts on my desktop tower computer, my account with gnome desktop and my wife's account with cinnamon desktop.

My wife has a bookmarks file in json format. It was created by her on her laptop. I checked that the json is valid with a json validator. She can not restore her bookmarks with this json file. She uses the "Import and Backup" command, then gets the mesage "This will replace all of your current bookmarks with the back. Are you sure?" After clicking OK, nothing happens - the bookmarks are not restored and there is no error message.

Otherwise, both accounts have no problems of any sort.

Please help.

Thank you, Joe

title: estudo floristico
content: Nome e Número UFSCar de todos os alunos do grupo. b) Introdução: a introdução deve contextualizar o trabalho de Estudo Florístico como parte do conteúdo da disciplina de “Biologia de Fanerógamas” e descrever os objetivos desse trabalho. c) Material e Métodos: deve incluir a metodologia empregada e os materiais utilizados para cada uma das seguintes etapas: coleta, herborização, identificações e descrições, incluindo as referências bibliográficas utilizadas em cada etapa. Também deve ser feita uma breve descrição das regiões onde as 6 plantas foram coletadas. d) Resultados e Discussão: deve ser incluída uma lista das plantas coletadas organizada em uma tabela. Essa tabela deve conter, para cada material: o gênero, o coletor, o número de coleta e o município. Descreva e ilustre, com as fotografias ou desenhos, os passos das chaves utilizadas para a identificação de cada família. Inclua a chave de identificação das 6 espécies já confeccionada pelo grupo na etapa anterior. Deverá ser feita uma descrição morfológica de cada uma das 6 plantas coletadas. A descrição deve ser baseada no material coletado e não em livros ou outras referências. Associe a descrição com o material coletado, citando o coletor e o número de coleta após a descrição como “Material Examinado”; lembre- se de que cada material deve ter uma identificação única (coletor+número). Ao final de cada descrição, deverá ser feita uma breve discussão sobre as características morfológicas encontradas nos materiais descritos que caracterizaram as famílias às quais eles pertencem. Também deverá ser fornecido o posicionamento dessas famílias nos grandes clados e ordens de Angiospermas, segundo o site http://www.mobot.org/MOBOT/research/APweb/welcome.html (por exemplo: Monocotiledôneas, Eudicotiledôneas, Rosídeas, Myrtales, etc.). As 6 plantas deverão ser ilustradas com fotos de, no mínimo, o hábito (mostrando características como filotaxia, forma da folha, etc.), a flor (preferencialmente um corte longitudinal destacando os elementos que a constituem – perianto, androceu e gineceu) e um detalhe de alguma estrutura diagnóstica da família. Cada foto deve ser descrita brevemente na legenda. Não esqueçam de citar as fotos na parte do texto relativa ao material. e) Referências bibliográficas: todas as referências utilizadas devem constar neste item, incluindo livros e sites usados para a identificação das famílias e gêneros e bibliografia usada para levantamento de caracteres sobre as famílias e os gêneros

title: Why is Instagram not loading properly on Firefox? Any fixes?
content:
I've been having issues with Instagram not loading properly on Firefox. Sometimes images and videos don’t appear, and the site feels slow compared to Chrome. This makes it frustrating, especially when trying to engage with my audience and grow my Instagram followers.

I’ve tried clearing my cache, disabling extensions, and even updating my browser, but nothing seems to work. Is this a common issue with Firefox, or is there a specific setting I need to change?

As, I run a business, where people can buy Instagram followers to give their profiles a boost. People often ask questions about services on Instagram DMs. So, having Instagram work smoothly on all browsers is important.

Has anyone else faced this problem? Any fixes that worked for you?"

title: Antivirové hlášení v hlavičce emailu
content:
Dobrý den, vždy po přijetí emailu a následném pokusu o vytisknutí mi jednu celou stránku (ne vždy, někdy je tam i něco co potřebuju vytisknout, proto nemůžu tisknout od druhé stránky) zabere něco jako antivirové hlášení: 1. X-Mozilla Status X-Mozilla Status2 X-Virus-Scanned X-Spam-Flag X-Spam-Score X-Spam-Status Received Autentication-Result DKIM-Signature Received Content-Type Content-Transfer-Encoding Verze MIME ID zprávy X-Mailer

V emailu je to v hlavičce emailu, tedy pod adresou ze které email přišel: Adresa- Datum- Antivirové hlášení- Až poté text samotného emailu.

Jak to prosím dostat pryč, abych mohl emaily tisknout bez problému a neplýtval barvou tiskárny?

content:

I've uninstalled FF, deleted the folder in the Programs folder, and reinstalled it from scratch, but there is no change (the one difference is that it wouldn't open in Admin after before I reinstalled it). title: Why has my firefox browser gone Nazi?
content:
Firefox is putting me in indefinite timeouts. WTH?!

It has suddenly decided to create a two hour timeout, which is now going on 24 hours and counting.

"The sign-in option is disabled because of failed sign-in attempts or repeated shutdowns. Use a different sign-in option, or keep your device powered on for at least two hours and then try again."

It is not my browser's job to police me. How do I get rid of this obnoxious crap forever? I Lart of the issue is the NumLock is no longer automatically activated. It always was before.

I also don't care for it's challenge question where I have to enter in A1B2C3. I have a security protocol and don't need more to bog me down!

title: Discord mic not working
content:
I blocked it for a quick second. I had no idea it would be a multi hour nightmare to get it back on, and it still isn't. Why? Well because the "help link" page no longer exits, ratherthe page that the image that it shows no longer exists. You don't have the option to turn it back on, and why in the hell would I have to go to firefox settings to turn it back on to begin with.

I literally just now figured it out. Holy fuck. For me anyway.

Go into discord settings and click on the voice & video and hit "let's check". Click yes when it asks to allow permission.

I'm just so damn glad someone got butthurt earlier and erased my post. You're fucking trash for doing that.

Hopefully this is actually helpful to folks having problems. I'm not a butthurt little bitch like the folks that look over this site. I actually help.
creator: Charles3rddd

title: Firefox crash multiple times during video playback (Once/Twice not caused by video)
content:
Firefox crashes randomly during video playback. I've submitted over 10 crash reports. Here's the two latest crash report (which includes my device's hardware information): https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/81eb1750-1dd0-490d-9eb1-d3c2c0250224 https://crash-stats.mozilla.org/report/index/6682a7f2-836a-4365-938e-c9ab20250224

I'm on Fedora 41 + gnome, but this issue persisted even in Windows 11, which caused BSOD therefore I made the switch to linux (At least in linux it doesn't crash the whole system, only firefox). If you need any additional information let me know. I can run journalctl/dmesg if required.

I've already tried things like restarting in safe mode (troubleshoot mode), refreshing firefox etc. Didn't work.

Thanks in advance!
creator: dennisheyuxi
